I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
p: pos n

Goal:
vec_pos vec_zero p = 0

Premises:
vec_zero = vec_set_pos (fun _ : pos n => 0) : vec nat n
Notation pos := Fin.t
vec_pos : forall (X : Type) (n : nat), vec X n -> pos n -> X
vec_zero_plus : forall v : vec nat n, vec_plus vec_zero v = v
vec_pos_plus : forall (v w : vec nat n) (p : pos n), vec_pos (vec_plus v w) p = vec_pos v p + vec_pos w p
vec_plus = fun v w : vec nat n => vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => vec_pos v p + vec_pos w p) : vec nat n -> vec nat n -> vec nat n
vec_pos_ext : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v w : vec X n), (forall p : pos n, vec_pos v p = vec_pos w p) -> v = w
vec_pos_tail : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X (S n)) (p : pos n), vec_pos (vec_tail v) p = vec_pos v (pos_nxt p)
vec_change_neq : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p q : pos n) (x : X), p <> q -> vec_pos (vec_change v p x) q = vec_pos v q
vec_pos_set : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (g : pos n -> X) (p : pos n), vec_pos (vec_set_pos g) p = g p
vec_change_eq : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p q : pos n) (x : X), p = q -> vec_pos (vec_change v p x) q = x
in_vec_inv : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (x : X), in_vec x v -> exists p : pos n, vec_pos v p = x
vec_list_inv : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (x : X), In x (vec_list v) -> exists p : pos n, x = vec_pos v p
vec_pos_app_left : forall (X : Type) (n m : nat) (v : vec X n) (w : vec X m) (i : pos n), vec_pos (vec_app v w) (pos_left m i) = vec_pos v i
vec_pos_app_right : forall (X : Type) (n m : nat) (v : vec X n) (w : vec X m) (i : pos m), vec_pos (vec_app v w) (pos_right n i) = vec_pos w i
vec_list_In_iff : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (x : X), In x (vec_list v) < -> (exists p : pos n, x = vec_pos v p)
vec_pos_map : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p : pos n), vec_pos (vec_map f v) p = f (vec_pos v p)
in_vec_dec_inv : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n), (forall x y : X, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall x : X, in_vec x v -> {p : pos n | vec_pos v p = x}
vec_pos0 : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X (S n)), vec_pos v pos0 = vec_head v
vec_pos1 : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X (S (S n))), vec_pos v pos1 = vec_head (vec_tail v)
Init.Nat.add = fix add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S p => S (add p m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.add (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : vec ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.hd v ## VectorDef.tl v where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p0 q : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p0 = q where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type]
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]

```coq
unfold vec_pos, vec_zero.
rewrite vec_pos_set.
reflexivity.
Qed.
```
